item.title: Overhanging branches - Hazard, 7th August
item.description:
Alton Garden haa a tree with branvhes overhanging onto the public pavement. I witnessed a blind man over 6 foot tall get entangled in the overhanging branches. I myself am 5ft 5 and the branches reach eye level. Please can these branchea be cut back urgently before an accident happens.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Copers Cope Road, New Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: On path way/ public road, 7th August
